```{r}
source("./visual_fx.R")

con_ctc<- connect_to_db("cancel_the_contract")

df<-dbGetQuery(con_ctc, "SELECT race, rate_own FROM analysis_homeowners_renters_race") %>%
  rename("label"="race") %>%
  race_recode(.)


indicator <- "Homeowners renters"
title_text <- "Black AV residents have a much lower homeownership rate compared to other groups"

single_bar_tot(df, indicator, title_text)

dbDisconnect(con_ctc)
```
